eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: San Miguel, CO; AT 01:39 PM ON SEP 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:09 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 9/13 2:35 pm: Due to severe weather and lightning in the area, Town Park is under an evacuation order effective immediately. Please leave your personal items (chairs, pop ups, tarps, etc) and proceed to your accommodations or an appropriate shelter. Town Park campers should proceed to Hanley Pavilion immediately.
